attributes.action: Optional virtual attendance at Local Government committees in perpetuity.
attributes.additional_details: Virtual meetings have had there advantages in terms of inclusivity and wider participation. This has really benefited our local community structures and we want virtual attendance in all local government meetings to be an option. This we have learned is essential for reaching residents who are in rural communities furthermore those with responsibilities they cannot leave.
attributes.background: Cambridge Labour City Councillors call on parliament to vote on allowing virtual attendance in local government meetings and committees an option in perpetuity.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Extend local authorities' power to hold virtual meetings beyond 7 May
